question: This company developed the country's first bio-CNG (bio-methane) bus.
explanation: Tata Motors has developed the country's first bio-CNG (bio-methane) bus. Bio-CNG will help in contributing to the smart cities and to keep them clean and is a good option for Wet Garbage management. It is aimed to develop environment-friendly vehicles. Bio methane is produced out of bio-degradable materials like kitchen waste.
